verses.verse: וַיִּקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> took בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the sons אַ֠הֲרֹן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron נָדָ֨ב <S%H5070><s%> And Nadab וַאֲבִיה֜וּא <S%H30><s%> and Abihu אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> either מַחְתָּת֗וֹ <S%H4289><s%> of them his censer וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> and put בָהֵן֙ <S%H2004><s%> therein אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> and put עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and קְטֹ֑רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense וַיַּקְרִ֜בוּ <S%H7126><s%> thereon and offered לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire זָרָ֔ה <S%H2114><s%> strange אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹ֦א <S%H3808><s%> had not צִוָּ֖ה <S%H6680><s%> which he commanded אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַתֵּ֥צֵא <S%H3318><s%> And there went out אֵ֛שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD וַתֹּ֣אכַל <S%H398><s%> and devoured אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וַיָּמֻ֖תוּ <S%H4191><s%> them and they died לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> Then Moses אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron הוּא֩ <S%H1931><s%> It אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> is what דִּבֶּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> This [is it] that the LORD לֵאמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> saying בִּקְרֹבַ֣י <S%H7138><s%> in them that come nigh אֶקָּדֵ֔שׁ <S%H6942><s%> I will be sanctified וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> me and before כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> all the people אֶכָּבֵ֑ד <S%H3513><s%> I will be glorified וַיִּדֹּ֖ם <S%H1826><s%> held his peace אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <S%H175><s%> And Aaron

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> called מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מִֽישָׁאֵל֙ <S%H4332><s%> Mishael וְאֶ֣ל <S%H413><s%> and אֶלְצָפָ֔ן <S%H469><s%> and Elzaphan בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons עֻזִּיאֵ֖ל <S%H5816><s%> of Uzziel דֹּ֣ד <S%H1730><s%> the uncle אַהֲרֹ֑ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to קִ֠רְב֞וּ <S%H7126><s%> unto them Come near שְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> carry אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחֵיכֶם֙ <S%H251><s%> your brethren מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> from before הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> the sanctuary אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> out לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> of the camp

וַֽיִּקְרְב֗וּ <S%H7126><s%> So they went near וַיִּשָּׂאֻם֙ <S%H5375><s%> and carried בְּכֻתֳּנֹתָ֔ם <S%H3801><s%> them in their coats אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> out לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> of the camp כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> had said מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> as Moses

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹ֡ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron וּלְאֶלְעָזָר֩ <S%H499><s%> and unto Eleazar וּלְאִֽיתָמָ֨ר ׀ <S%H385><s%> and unto Ithamar בָּנָ֜יו <S%H1121><s%> his sons רָֽאשֵׁיכֶ֥ם <S%H7218><s%> not your heads אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּפְרָ֣עוּ ׀ <S%H6544><s%> Uncover וּבִגְדֵיכֶ֤ם <S%H899><s%> your clothes לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִפְרֹ֙מוּ֙ <S%H6533><s%> neither rend וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תָמֻ֔תוּ <S%H4191><s%> lest ye die וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעֵדָ֖ה <S%H5712><s%> come upon all the people יִקְצֹ֑ף <S%H7107><s%> and lest wrath וַאֲחֵיכֶם֙ <S%H251><s%> but let your brethren כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the whole house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יִבְכּוּ֙ <S%H1058><s%> bewail אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשְּׂרֵפָ֔ה <S%H8316><s%> the burning אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׂרַ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> hath kindled יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD

וּמִפֶּתַח֩ <S%H6607><s%> from the door אֹ֨הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֜ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> even תֵֽצְאוּ֙ <S%H3318><s%> And ye shall not go out פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> or תָּמֻ֔תוּ <S%H4191><s%> lest ye die כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שֶׁ֛מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil מִשְׁחַ֥ת <S%H4888><s%> for the anointing יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> and וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> [is] upon you And they did כִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> according to the word מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> of Moses פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

יַ֣יִן <S%H3196><s%> wine וְשֵׁכָ֞ר <S%H7941><s%> nor strong drink אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תֵּ֣שְׁתְּ ׀ <S%H8354><s%> Do not drink אַתָּ֣ה ׀ <S%H859><s%> you וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H1121><s%> thou nor thy sons אִתָּ֗ךְ <S%H854><s%> for בְּבֹאֲכֶ֛ם <S%H935><s%> with thee when ye go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> into the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תָמֻ֑תוּ <S%H4191><s%> lest ye die חֻקַּ֥ת <S%H2708><s%> [it shall be] a statute עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1755><s%> throughout your generations

וּֽלֲהַבְדִּ֔יל <S%H914><s%> And that ye may put difference בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> between holy וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> and between הַחֹ֑ל <S%H2455><s%> and unholy וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between הַטָּמֵ֖א <S%H2931><s%> and between unclean וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between הַטָּהֽוֹר׃ <S%H2889><s%> and clean

וּלְהוֹרֹ֖ת <S%H3384><s%> And that ye may teach אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַ֣חֻקִּ֔ים <S%H2706><s%> all the statutes אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> to בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> unto them by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> of Moses פ

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> spake מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron וְאֶ֣ל <S%H413><s%> about אֶ֠לְעָזָר <S%H499><s%> and unto Eleazar וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and אִ֨יתָמָ֥ר ׀ <S%H385><s%> and unto Ithamar בָּנָיו֮ <S%H1121><s%> his sons הַנּֽוֹתָרִים֒ <S%H3498><s%> that were left קְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּנְחָ֗ה <S%H4503><s%> the meat offering הַנּוֹתֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H3498><s%> that remaineth מֵאִשֵּׁ֣י <S%H801><s%> made by fire יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאִכְל֥וּהָ <S%H398><s%> and eat מַצּ֖וֹת <S%H4682><s%> it without leaven אֵ֣צֶל <S%H681><s%> beside הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> the altar כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> for it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> holy הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> You

וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֤ם <S%H398><s%> And ye shall eat אֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> בְּמָק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place קָדֹ֔שׁ <S%H6918><s%> it in the holy כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because חָקְךָ֤ <S%H2706><s%> because it [is] thy due וְחָק־ <S%H2706><s%> due בָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1121><s%> and thy sons' הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he מֵאִשֵּׁ֖י <S%H801><s%> made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because כֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> thus צֻוֵּֽיתִי׃ <S%H6680><s%> for so I am commanded

וְאֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> חֲזֵ֨ה <S%H2373><s%> breast הַתְּנוּפָ֜ה <S%H8573><s%> And the wave וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> שׁ֣וֹק <S%H7785><s%> shoulder הַתְּרוּמָ֗ה <S%H8641><s%> and heave תֹּֽאכְלוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> shall ye eat בְּמָק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place טָה֔וֹר <S%H2889><s%> in a clean אַתָּ֕ה <S%H859><s%> you וּבָנֶ֥יךָ <S%H1121><s%> thou and thy sons וּבְנֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H1323><s%> and thy daughters אִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> for כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> as חָקְךָ֤ <S%H2706><s%> with thee for [they be] thy due וְחָק־ <S%H2706><s%> due בָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1121><s%> and thy sons' נִתְּנ֔וּ <S%H5414><s%> [which] are given מִזִּבְחֵ֥י <S%H2077><s%> out of the sacrifices שַׁלְמֵ֖י <S%H8002><s%> of peace offerings בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

שׁ֣וֹק <S%H7785><s%> shoulder הַתְּרוּמָ֞ה <S%H8641><s%> The heave וַחֲזֵ֣ה <S%H2373><s%> breast הַתְּנוּפָ֗ה <S%H8573><s%> and the wave עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> along אִשֵּׁ֤י <S%H801><s%> with the offerings made by fire הַחֲלָבִים֙ <S%H2459><s%> of the fat יָבִ֔יאוּ <S%H935><s%> shall they bring לְהָנִ֥יף <S%H5130><s%> to wave תְּנוּפָ֖ה <S%H8573><s%> [it for] a wave offering לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְךָ֜ וּלְבָנֶ֤יךָ <S%H1121><s%> and it shall be thine and thy sons' אִתְּךָ֙ <S%H854><s%> for לְחָק־ <S%H2706><s%> with thee by a statute עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD

וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> שְׂעִ֣יר <S%H8163><s%> the goat הַֽחַטָּ֗את <S%H2403><s%> of the sin offering דָּרֹ֥שׁ <S%H1875><s%> diligently דָּרַ֛שׁ <S%H1875><s%> sought מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold שֹׂרָ֑ף <S%H8313><s%> and behold it was burnt וַ֠יִּקְצֹף <S%H7107><s%> and he was angry עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אֶלְעָזָ֤ר <S%H499><s%> with Eleazar וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אִֽיתָמָר֙ <S%H385><s%> and Ithamar בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron הַנּוֹתָרִ֖ם <S%H3498><s%> [which were] left לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> [alive] saying

מַדּ֗וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֲכַלְתֶּ֤ם <S%H398><s%> Wherefore have ye not eaten אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחַטָּאת֙ <S%H2403><s%> the sin offering בִּמְק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> in the holy כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> seeing it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> holy הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> he וְאֹתָ֣הּ ׀ <S%H853><s%> נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and [God] hath given לָכֶ֗ם לָשֵׂאת֙ <S%H5375><s%> it you to bear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity הָעֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> of the congregation לְכַפֵּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> to make atonement עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> for them before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

הֵ֚ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not הוּבָ֣א <S%H935><s%> of it was not brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּמָ֔הּ <S%H1818><s%> the blood אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> the holy פְּנִ֑ימָה <S%H6441><s%> in within אָכ֨וֹל <S%H398><s%> [place] ye should indeed תֹּאכְל֥וּ <S%H398><s%> have eaten אֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> בַּקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> it in the holy כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> I צִוֵּֽיתִי׃ <S%H6680><s%> [place] as I commanded

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> said אַהֲרֹ֜ן <S%H175><s%> And Aaron אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold הַ֠יּוֹם <S%H3117><s%> Behold this day הִקְרִ֨יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> have they offered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַטָּאתָ֤ם <S%H2403><s%> their sin offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹֽלָתָם֙ <S%H5930><s%> and their burnt offering לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַתִּקְרֶ֥אנָה <S%H7122><s%> and such things have befallen אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> כָּאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְאָכַ֤לְתִּי <S%H398><s%> me and [if] I had eaten חַטָּאת֙ <S%H2403><s%> the sin offering הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> to day הַיִּיטַ֖ב <S%H3190><s%> should it have been accepted בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD
